name: McCormick Culinary Dehydrated Chopped Onion, 4 lb
short_description: PERFECT SUBSTITUTE FOR FRESH ONIONS McCormick Culinary Dehydrated Chopped Onion is an ideal substitute for fresh onions; cuts down food preparation time in a busy kitchen; soak onions in cold water for 20 minutes to reactivate flavor and texture

PREMIUM CHOPPED ONIONS: Premium dehydrated chopped onions add 4 times more flavor than fresh onions with the same excellent taste and simple rehydration; takes up less storage space and makes cooking or garnishing with onions easy

MADE FOR CHEFS: Made for culinary professionals, each 4-pound container is perfect for back-of-house use; open like a milk carton to dispense dehydrated onion flakes, then store the original container or divide the product into smaller portions

VERSATILITY: Using dried chopped onions is a convenient alternative to peeling, cutting and storing fresh onions; longer shelf life for cooking more vegetable, stuffing, soup or burger recipes without reordering
A BRAND YOU TRUST: McCormick Culinary onions are sourced from a secure supply chain and carefully peeled and cut before entering a 20-hour dehydration process; dried and chopped onions have no salt
product_description: Want to save on preparation time in the kitchen without sacrificing flavor? McCormick Culinary Dehydrated Onion has you covered. With dehydrated onion flakes on hand, you'll always be ready to season your signature dishes or use some as a garnish in all kinds of vegetable or soup recipes. McCormick Culinary Dehydrated Chopped Onion comes from a secure global supply chain to ensure consistency. Each onion is peeled and chopped before being dehydrated for 20 hours. As an alternative to fresh onions, dehydrated onions maintain the same excellent flavor. These premium flakes are a great alternative to selecting, peeling and chopping fresh onions every day. Because they offer four times as much taste as fresh onions, these flakes will take up less space than an equivalent amount of fresh onions in your kitchen. What's more, they last longer. Once you soak them, dehydrated onions function the same way as the fresh vegetable and make an excellent cooking ingredient or garnish. McCormick Culinary Dehydrated Chopped Onion is a versatile dry ingredient for busy kitchens. When you need to maximize your preparation time, you can use pre-chopped, dried onion flakes. Rejuvenate dehydrated onions in cold water for 20 minutes, then transform your menu with these flavorful vegetables. Your back-of-house staff is busy enough, so they can save time on food preparation with bulk dried chopped onions. Each 4-pound container opens like a carton for easy pouring and measuring. You can use this product for any recipe in which you would include its fresh alternative. A few chef-approved examples would be redskin potato salad, sage and onion stuffing and homestyle meatloaf with a brown sugar glaze. These chopped onions can also enhance snacks like southwest ranch dip with house-made potato chips. No matter how you decide to use it, the result is a batch of flavor-packed, long-lasting, dried onion flakes with no salt.

short_description: CHOPPED ONION - White Chopped Onion brings a sharp yet semi-sweet and mild flavor to your dishes. Deliver the flavor of whole, white onions but in ready to use alternative to whole onions for prepared food items.

BEST USES - Spice up salads, hamburgers, soups, stews, pasta, and more with the semi-sweet, mild, and sharp notes of white onion. This ready-to-use alternative to whole onions is perfect for enhancing prepared food items.

WHY BUY BULK – Bulk buying saves you money and reduces harmful single-use packaging waste. With our new recyclable packaging, we will help keep over 2 million plastic containers and bags out of landfills every year.

COMMITTED TO PEOPLE & PLANET - Our sustainable sourcing programs start with a commitment and investment in our growers. Through mutually beneficial partnerships, we source our ingredients ethically and responsibly.

ABOUT US - We are Frontier Co-op, a global leader in natural and organic products. As an ethically committed herb and spice company, we are united by our mission to put people and planet before profits.
product_description: Frontier Co-op organic white, chopped onion adds its sharp, yet semi-sweet, mild flavor to many foods from stews and pasta to cuisines and salads. The flavorful taste and wholesomeness have made white onions the most common onion in Mexican cuisine, as well as in soups, shish kebabs, casseroles, hamburgers, and hot dogs. Best Uses: Mexican Food, Stews, Soups, Deli Sandwiches, Hamburgers, Relish, Casseroles FEATURES 1 pound bulk bag (16 ounces) Organic certified, kosher certified Non-irradiated Semi-sweet, mild, and sharp flavor enhancer Botanical name: Allium cepa L.

short_description: THE BEST DEHYDRATED ONIONS: Our chopped onions undergo a meticulous dehydration process that ensures the retention of essential nutrients, flavors, and aromas. Additionally, they are free from any additives or preservatives.
PREMIUM FLAVOR: Despite being dehydrated, our chopped onions retain much of their natural flavor. They offer a robust and savory taste, with a slightly sweeter undertone compared to fresh onions.
SUPREME QUALITY: From the finest ingredients to the meticulous production process, we prioritize excellence at every step.
LONGER SHELF-LIFE: Dehydrated chopped onions are a handy addition to your pantry. They stay fresh for a long time, allowing you to store them without worrying about spoilage.
CONVENIENT PACKAGING: Our screw-top plastic jar makes it exceptionally convenient and user-friendly.
product_description: With their golden hue and fragrant aroma, chopped, dehydrated onions serve as a time-saving substitute for fresh onions, without compromising on taste. Their texture is slightly crisper than fresh onions, adding a delightful crunch to various recipes. When rehydrated, these onions regain their natural juiciness, allowing them to blend seamlessly into soups, stews, sauces, and other culinary creations. Chopped, dehydrated onions possess a savory and sweet flavor that adds depth and complexity to dishes. Their concentrated taste enhances the overall taste profile of a recipe, providing a rich and robust onion flavor. Whether used as a seasoning, garnish, or ingredient, these versatile dehydrated onions offer convenience without sacrificing the deliciousness that onions bring to a dish.
